meaningMnemonic: If you're <radical>anti</radical>-<radical>tree</radical>, you won't mind if I turn all of them into <kanji>board</kanji>s! Hahaha!
readingMnemonic: Turning every tree you could lay your eyes on into <kanji>board</kanji>s has gotten the attention of the Tree Lovers Association. "<reading>Ban</reading>ned (ばん), BANNED, I say!", they shouted at you.
